Verses: 1 karththarai Thudhiyungal; Avar Nallavar, Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
2 karththaraal Saththuruvin Kaikku Neengalaakki Meetkappattu,
3 kizhakkilum Merkilum Vadakkilum Therkilumulla Pala Dhesangalilumirundhu Serkkappattavargal, Appadi Sollakkadavargal.
4 avargal Thaabarikkum Oorai Kaanaamal, Vanaandharaththile Avaandhara Vazhiyaai,
5 pasiyaagavum, Thaagamaagavum, Aaththumaa Thoindhadhaagavum Alaindhu Thirindhaargal.
6 thangal Aabaththile Karththarai Nokki Kooppittaargal, Avargal Ikkattugalilirundhu Avargalai Viduviththaar.
7 thaabarikkum Oorukkuppoichchera, Avargalai Sevvaiyaana Vazhiyile Nadaththinaar.
8 thavanamulla Aaththumaavai Karththar Thirupthiyaakki, Pasiyulla Aaththumaavai Nanmaiyinaal Nirappugiraarendru,
9 avarudaiya Kirubaiyinimiththamum, Manupuththirarukku Avar Seygira Adhisayangalinimiththamum Avarai Thudhippaargalaaga.
10 dhevanudaiya Vaarththaigalukku Virodhamaai Kalagampanni, Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Aalosanaiyai Asattaipanninavargal,
11 andhagaaraththilum Marana Irulilum Vaikkappattirundhu, Odukkaththilum Irumbilum Kattundu Kidandhaargal.
12 avargaludaiya Irudhayaththai Avar Varuththaththaal Thaazhththinaar; Sagaayarillaamal Vizhundhuponaargal.
13 thangal Aabaththile Karththarai Nokki Kooppittaargal; Avargal Ikkattugalilirundhu Avargalai Neengalaakki Ratchiththaar.
14 andhagaaraththilum Maranairulilumirundhu Avargalai Velippadappanni, Avargal Kattugalai Aruththaar.
15 karththar Vengala Kadhavugalai Udaiththu, Iruppu Thaazhppaalgalai Muriththaarendru,
16 avarudaiya Kirubaiyinimiththamum, Manupuththirarukku Avar Seygira Adhisayangalinimiththamum Avarai Thudhippaargalaaga.
17 nirmoodar Thangal Paadhagamaarkkaththaalum Thangal Akkiramangalaalum Noikondu Odungippogiraargal.
18 avargal Aaththumaa Sagala Pojanaththaiyum Arosikkiradhu, Avargal Maranavaasalgal Pariyandham Sameebikkiraargal.
19 thangal Aabaththile Karththarai Nokki Kooppidugiraargal; Avargal Ikkattugalukku Avargalai Neengalaakki Ratchikkiraar.
20 avar Thamadhu Vasanaththai Anuppi Avargalai Gunamaakki, Avargalai Azhivukku Thappuvikkiraar.
21 avargal Karththarai Avarudaiya Kirubaiyinimiththamum, Manupuththirarukku Avar Seygira Adhisayangalinimiththamum Thudhiththu,
22 sthoththirabaligalai Seluththi, Avarudaiya Kiriyaigalai Aanandha Saththaththode Vivarippaargalaaga.
23 kappaleri, Kadal Yaaththiraipanni, Thiralaana Thanneergalile Thozhil Seygiraargale,
24 avargal Karththarudaiya Kiriyaigalaiyum, Aazhaththile Avarudaiya Adhisayangalaiyum Kaangiraargal.
25 avar Kattalaiyida Perungaatru Ezhumbi, Adhin Alaigalai Kondhalikkappannum.
26 avargal Aagaayaththil Eri, Aazhangalil Irangugiraargal, Avargal Aaththumaa Kilesaththinaal Karaindhupogiradhu.
27 veriththavanaippol Alaindhu Thadumaarugiraargal; Avargaludaiya Gnaanamellaam Muzhugippogiradhu.
28 appozhudhu Thangal Aabaththile Avargal Karththarai Nokki Kooppidugiraargal, Avargal Ikkattugalukku Avargalai Neengalaakki Viduvikkiraar.
29 kondhalippai Amarththugiraar, Adhin Alaigal Adangugindradhu.
30 amaidhalundaanadhinimiththam Avargal Sandhoshappadugiraargal; Thaangal Naatina Thuraimugaththil Avargalai Konduvandhu Serkkiraar.
31 avargal Karththarai Avarudaiya Kirubaiyinimiththamum, Manupuththirarukku Avar Seygira Adhisayangalinimiththamum Thudhiththu,
32  Janangalin Sabaiyile Avarai Uyarththi, Mooppargalin Sangaththile Avarai Potruvaargalaaga.
33 avar Aarugalai Avaandhara Veliyaagavum, Neerootrugalai Varanda Sthalamaagavum,
34  Kudigaludaiya Pollaappinimiththam Sezhippaana Dhesaththai Uvarnilamaagavum Maatrugiraar.
35 avar Avaandharaveliyai Thanneerththadaagamaagavum, Varandanilaththai Neerootrugalaagavum Maatri,
36 pasiththavargalai Ange Kudiyetrugiraar; Ange Avargal Kudiyirukkum Nagaraththai Katti,
37 vayalgalai Undaakki Vidhaiththu, Thiraatchaththottangalai Naattugiraargal, Avaigal Varaththulla Balanai Tharum.
38 avargalai Aaseervadhikkiraar, Migudhiyum Perugugiraargal; Avargaludaiya Mirugajeevangal Kuraiyaadhirukkappannugiraar.
39 pinbu Avargal Idukkaththinaalum, Aabaththinaalum, Thuyaraththinaalum Kuraivupattu Thaazhvadaigiraargal.
40 avar Pirabukkalinmel Igazhchchi Varappanni, Vazhiyillaadha Avaandhara Veliyile Avargalai Thiriyachcheydhu,
41 eliyavanaiyo Sirumaiyinindru Eduththu, Uyarndha Adaikkalaththile Vaiththu, Avan Vamsangalai Mandhaiyaippolaakkugiraar.
42 uththamargal Adhaikkandu Magizhuvaargal; Niyaayakkedellaam Than Vaayai Moodum.
43 evan Gnaanamullavano Avan Ivaigalai Gavanikkakkadavan; Gnaanavaangal Karththarudaiya Kirubaigalai Unarndhukolvaargal.
